title: Passenger vehicle sales reach record high in FY24, two-wheeler sales grow by 13%
description: 4.22 million units of passenger vehicles sold in FY24. Two-wheeler sales grew by over 13% to 17.9 million units, while commercial vehicle sales remained flat at 967,000 units. The industry shifted to 20% ethanol blend, boosting electric vehicle demand. Optimism prevails with positive macroeconomic outlook.
